NG0454:1: gnyid la 'khor lo lta bu la //
NG0454:2: 'gro na nam mkha' lding gi lugs //
NG0454:4: bye brag gzhan la mkhas pa yis //
NG0454:5: ji ltar rigs pa sbyar bas 'grub //
NG0454:6: ngag ni rang bzhin smra dang bral //
NG0454:7: nyal na yi ge 'phrel ba bzlas //
NG0454:8: 'gro na rlung gis yi ge brten //
NG0454:9: 'dug na a yi rnam pa la //
NG0454:10: bye brag gzhan la mkhas pa sbyar //
NG0454:11: yid ni rang bzhin thun mong la //
NG0454:12: gar song phyi lam rjes rnams gcod //
NG0454:14: 'gro na rmi lam mkha' la spur //
NG0454:15: 'dug na thig le dra bar gzhug / bye brag gzhan la mkhas pa yis //
NG0454:16: gang la mos pa man ngag gis //
NG0454:17: gnas rnams bsgyur ba rnal 'byor bas //
NG0454:18: de yis dngos gzhi 'brel sbyar ba //
NG0454:19: 'gyu ba'i yul dbyung dran pa gsad //
NG0454:20: bsam pa'i yul lha sems rgyun gtod //
NG0454:21: yul dang shes pa sbyar bas shes //
NG0454:22: 'phro las mched pa'i dus mtha' bcad //
NG0454:23: gang snang rang gis thog tu dbab //
NG0454:24: gcig gi 'brel pa gcig gcad na //
NG0454:25: de la nyams kyis shes pa skye //
NG0454:26: dag pa chen po gzhi nyid la //
NG0454:27: bde ba sum cu rtsa gnyis 'char //
NG0454:28: de las 'bar dang bde las shes //
NG0454:29: thob pas 'khor lo can la 'jug / 'gro dang
NG0454:30: 'ong ba'i shugs rgyun 'gag / de la sogs kyis
NG0454:31: rnams 'phel bas // phar dang gzhan gyis bya ba bde //
NG0454:32: log dang ma log spor gnas dang *//
NG0454:33: ji ltar 'gyur ba grangs las shes //
NG0454:34: bsod nams las kyi bye brag rnams //
NG0454:35: ji ltar 'dod pa shes pa dang *//
NG0454:37: 'phen dang sdud pa las shes nas //
NG0454:38: de yi rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa yis yang *//
NG0454:39: yid gzhungs dran pa gsal po yis //
NG0454:40: rgyun du rtsis pas mngon par gsal //
NG0454:41: bsam gtan nyid kyi yon tan no //
NG0454:42: zhes bkod pa chen po a ti rdzogs pa'i rgyud las //
NG0454:43: khregs gcod las kyi mtha' gcod pa'i skabs //
NG0454:44: bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las man ngag tu phyung
NG0454:45: ba khregs gcod bdun pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so
